title: AWS re:Invent 2025-AI-Powered Observability & Observability for AI: The Two Sides of the Coin-AIM206
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025-AI驱动的可观测性与AI的可观测性:硬币的两面-AIM206
abstract: AI is transforming how we monitor and manage complex systems. But, while AI can predict, prevent, and even fix problems, it can also fail quietly. This session explores both sides of the coin: AI-powered observability, where AI augments human capability to detect and resolve issues faster, and observability for AI, where we ensure AI itself remains accurate, fair, and reliable. Through real-world scenarios and practical approaches, we’ll show how to build systems that watch over everything, including the AI that’s watching over us. This presentation is brought to you by ManageEngine, an AWS Partner.
abstract_cn: AI 正在改变我们监控和管理复杂系统的方式。但是，虽然 AI 可以预测、预防甚至修复问题，它也可能悄无声息地失败。本次会议探讨了这枚硬币的两面：AI 驱动的可观测性，即 AI 增强人类能力以更快地检测和解决问题；以及 AI 的可观测性，即我们确保 AI 本身保持准确、公平和可靠。通过真实场景和实用方法，我们将展示如何构建监控一切的系统，包括监控那些正在监控我们的 AI。本演讲由 AWS 合作伙伴 ManageEngine 提供。
